00101 namespace Reads {
00102 
00103   void getTrimmedSeq(const Read &r, std::string &seq) {
00104     
00105     int32_t ts, tl;
00106     r_get_int32_tag(r, "TS", ts);
00107     r_get_int32_tag(r, "TL", tl);
00108     seq = r_qname(r);
00109     if (tl != 0 && tl != r_length(r))
00110       seq = seq.substr(ts, tl);
00111   }
00112 
00113 }
00114 
00115 #define r_remove_tag(b, t) b->RemoveTag(t);
00116 #define r_add_Z_tag(b, t, v) b->AddTag(t, "Z", v);
00117 #define r_add_int32_tag(b, t, v) b->AddTag(t, "i", v);

00119 #define r_get_clip(b, p) do { for (auto& i : b->CigarData) if (i.Type == 'S' || i.Type == 'H') p += i.Length; } while (0)
00120 #define r_count_nbases(b, n) n = count(b->QueryBases.begin(), b->QueryBases.end(), 'N')
